title: Pre-Hearing Analysis with Andrea Mitchell, Katy Tur, and Hallie Jackson (Hearing #7, 7/12/22)
description: Andrea Mitchell, Katy Tur, and Hallie Jackson along with a range of expert guests preview the seventh in a series of public hearings by the Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol to share the findings of their investigation.
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
content:encoded: Andrea Mitchell, Katy Tur, and Hallie Jackson along with a range of expert guests preview the seventh in a series of public hearings by the Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol to share the findings of their investigation.
